title: Smoky vegan chilli
time: Hands-on time 20 min, plus simmering time 30 min
description: Serve up a smoky vegan chilli with our easy recipe. This plant-based chilli is packed with aubergine and black beans plus a hint of chipotle.
ingredients: 2 x 400g tins black beans, rinsed and drained
Nachos/rice, avocado and sliced pink pickled onions (shop-bought is fine) to serve

method.Step 1: Cook the aubergine under a hot grill for 15-20 minutes, turning every 5 minutes until blackened and softened. Leave to cool a little.

method.Step 2: Meanwhile, heat the oil in a large, non-stick casserole. Add the onion and peppers and fry over a medium heat for 10 minutes. Stir in the garlic and ground spices and cook for 2 more minutes. Add the chilli paste, tomatoes, black beans, vinegar and stock, then season.

method.Step 3: Use a spoon to scoop the aubergine flesh out of its skin in nuggets, then add them to the pan. Stir, then cook uncovered over a low heat for 30 minutes. Stir in the chocolate and season to taste with salt.

method.Step 4: Serve the chilli with nachos or rice, topped with avocado andpickled onions, if you like.
